long_description: Negotiate airports without stress with the 25 in. Sherpani Hemisphere Wheeled Luggage. The upright bag features 4 multidirectional spinner wheels that freely roll without effort on your part. Unique Sherpani fabric pattern lets you pick out your luggage quickly in the baggage-claim area. High-rebound spinner wheels are whisper-quiet. Smooth, one-touch retractable handle guides bag effortlessly. Sturdy ripstop-nylon construction features durable skid plates and reinforcement on high-wear areas. Large main compartment comes with a removable packing cube measuring 17 in. x 13 in. x 3 in. Embroidered paneling on the exterior of the Sherpani Hemisphere Wheeled Luggage is silicone-treated for water and stain resistance.
short_description: Negotiate airports without stress with the 25 in. Sherpani Hemisphere Wheeled Luggage. The upright bag features 4 multidirectional spinner wheels that freely roll without effort on your part.
